Confidential & Proprietary
Customer Service Unavailable on Friday, May 9th
As previously communicated in our May 1st eNews, we'd like to remind you that on Friday, May 9th, Milwaukee Customer Service will be closed and unavailable for inquiries or orders due to necessary system upgrades. All Utility Product lines are affected by this change. Please plan accordingly. We apologize in advance for any inconvenience.
